name: ClickToNailZ
description:

🌱👉 DEVELOPMENT IN PROGRESS 👈🌱
➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖

🏠 Welcome to ClickToNailZ - a world where every nail matters 🏠

In ClickToNailZ the objective is simple 🤯 - hit the nails with your hammer and nail the planks to complete the building. You are choosing the color and size of the planks. 👀

🥳️ We are so excited for releasing the first playable demo of ClickToNailZ 🥳️

Start by placing the frames to build the skeleton 💀 of the building where you will be nailing those planks. 👇

Once the frames are placed, you can place the planks and start nailing. 🔨

To give it a twist, you can change the size 📐 and color 🎨 of the planks and create a unique building.

When you nail all the planks, a new layer will be unlocked 🔓. Repeat the process ☝️ and build the house. 🏠

Enough of looking and reading, get your hammer 🔨 ready and start hitting those nails (they will not nail themselves 😲).

📢 More ANNOUNCEMENTS coming soon!! ⏳

💬 Join us on Discord - ClickToPlay 💬
